The video was widely circulated on socia: including Twitter and Facebook, with captions claiming it to be street rioting by Muslims in France.
The video was fact: checked by Alt News, a reputable fact-checking organization, in response to multiple requests received on WhatsApp and their official Android application.
Through reverse: image searches and analysis of keyframes, Alt News found the same video on Reddit, captioned as a protest in Barcelona against a new lockdown policy.
Reuters had previously published a fact: check report on a similar incident falsely claimed to be the Vienna attack, but their video actually showed the Barcelona riots from a different angle, indicating that both videos represent the same incident.
